message:
SYSTEM: 01.03_NonStandardOWLReasoning_ModularisationAndDebugging.pdf: Página 13
13 
Root Unsatisfiable Classes 
•  How do we know which unsatisfiable classes to focus 
on? 
•  Example: the TAMBIS ontology  
contains 144 unsatisfiable classes 
•  How do we know where to start? 
•  The satisfiability of one class may depend on the satisfiability 
of another class 
•  The tools show unsatisfiable class names in red 
25 
Root Unsatisfiable Classes 
•  A class whose satisfiability depends on another class 
is known as a derived unsatisfiable class 
•  An unsatisfiable class that is not a derived 
unsatisfiable class is a root unsatisfiable class 
•  Root unsatisfiable classes should be examined and 
fixed first 
26
speaker: SYSTEM
